original_title: Wishbone Ash - Almighty Blues + London & Beyond
overview: This is a compilation video: Disc 1 is a jumbled reissue version of Wishbone Ash - Almighty Blues London & Beyond with 6 fewer tracks; those tracks missing are The King Will Come, Living Proof, Ballad Of The Beacon, Blowin' Free, Bad Weather Blues and Wings Of Desire, and Disc 2 is a reissue of the original 1990 VHS release Wishbone Ash - Wishbone Ash "Live". Disc 2 is titled "Ash From The Vaults Live In Bristol" as printed on the disc.
title: Wishbone Ash - Almighty Blues + London & Beyond
